mapper.select: select *, round(100.0 * a.cnt_total / sum(a.cnt_total) over()::numeric, 1) as ratio from (select row_number() over(order by count(c_category) desc) as row_number, c_category, count(*) as cnt_total from category where c_date >= #{start_date} and c_date <= #{end_date} group by c_category order by cnt_total desc limit 10) a

select a.row_number, a.c_category, a.cnt_total, round(100.0 * a.cnt_total / sum(a.cnt_total) over()::numeric, 2) as ratio, round(((a.cnt_total-coalesce(b.cnt_total,0))/ coalesce(b.cnt_total,1)::numeric)* 100::numeric , 2) as roc from (select row_number() over( order by count(c_category) desc) as row_number, c_category, count(c_category) as cnt_total from category where c_date >= #{start_date} and c_date <= #{end_date} group by c_category limit 10) a left outer join (select coalesce(c_category,null) as c_category, coalesce(count(c_category),0) as cnt_total from date_category dc left outer join category c on dc.c_date = c.c_date where dc.c_date >= to_char(#{start_date}::date-interval '1 year', 'yyyy-mm-dd') and dc.c_date <= to_char(#{end_date}::date-interval '1 year', 'yyyy-mm-dd') group by c_category order by cnt_total desc) b on a.c_category = b.c_category order by a.row_number;

select c_date, COALESCE(all_cnt,0) as cnt_total from date_category dc left outer join (select sum(cnt_total) as all_cnt, date from ( select row_number() over(order by count(c_category) desc) as row_number, c_category, count(c_category) as cnt_total, c_date as date from category where c_date >= #{start_date} and c_date <= #{end_date} and c_category like '%'||#{c_category}||'%' group by c_category, date) a group by date) aa on dc.c_date = aa.date where dc.c_date >= #{start_date} and dc.c_date <= #{end_date} order by c_date

select c_date, COALESCE(all_cnt,0) as cnt_total from date_category dc left outer join (select sum(cnt_total) as all_cnt, date from ( select c_category, count(c_category) as cnt_total, c_date as date from category where c_date >= to_char(#{start_date}::date-interval '1 year','yyyy-mm-dd') and c_date <= to_char(#{end_date}::date-interval '1 year','yyyy-mm-dd') and c_category like '%'||#{c_category}||'%' group by c_category, date) a group by date) aa on dc.c_date = aa.date where dc.c_date >= to_char(#{start_date}::date-interval '1 year','yyyy-mm-dd') and dc.c_date <= to_char(#{end_date}::date-interval '1 year','yyyy-mm-dd') order by c_date

select coalesce(round(avg(cnt_total)::numeric ,2),0) as allAvg from ( select sum(cnt_total) as cnt_total, date from ( select c_category, count(c_category) as cnt_total, c_date as date from category where c_date >= to_char(#{start_date}::date-interval '1 year','yyyy-mm-dd') and c_date <= to_char(#{end_date}::date-interval '1 year','yyyy-mm-dd') and c_category like '%'||#{c_category}||'%' group by c_category, date order by date ) a group by date ) aa
